titleStmt.title: Converting TEI to LaTeX using XSLT
titleStmt.author: Andrew A. Cashner

titlePage.titlePart: Converting TEI to LaTeX using XSLT

div.head: Summary
div.p: Can I convert this text from TEI-XML to LaTeX? I will try using XSLT.
Note that I can also use footnotes. This is such a footnote.
